nodes.text: When the Confederacy of Independent Systems invaded the planet of Ryloth, the title of emir of Ryloth was given to Wat Tambor, the Techno Union's lead engineer and foreman, by Count Dooku. However, Tambor's occupation of Ryloth came to an end when he was captured by the combined might of the Galactic Republic and Twi'lek Resistance.
